price: Je! Hapana katika haya kiapo kwa mwenye akili?
arabic: هَلۡ فِي ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٞ لِّذِي حِجۡرٍ
footnotes: Je! Katika vitu vilivyo tajwa vinavyo onekana kwa akili hapana kiapo cha kukinaisha?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: hal fī dhālika qasamun lidhī ḥij'rin
